message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hey Alice, $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $110 at the moment. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $130, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Alice, $130 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $120, which is my absolute maximum. If you're open to that, we can close the deal.
